testcase.name: Listar albumes comprados por el usuario
testcase.system-out: * def endPoint = 'https://nodejs-qa-training.herokuapp.com/' .............. passed * def getResponseLoguin = call read('Login.feature@FlujoExitoso') ......... passed Given url (endPoint) ...................................................... passed And path '/users/'+getResponseLoguin.response.user_id+'/albums' ........... passed And header Authorization = (getResponseLoguin).responseHeaders['Authorization'][0] . passed When method Get ........................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed * def jsonBodyResposeValidate = read('../jsons/JsonListaAlbumesCompradosBodyResponseValidate.json') . passed And match each response == jsonBodyResposeValidate ........................ passed * print response .......................................................... passed
